procedure.title: Applies this procedure when replace the braking computer

procstep.para: Connect aDiagnostic tool(NXR, OPTIMA 5800 or Clip), switch on the ignition and then:

ul.li: choose the menu "Renault vehicle fault finding" ,
select and confirm the vehicle type,
select and confirm the "ABS - ABR" system as the system on which to run fault finding,

procstep.para: Select and confirm successively the following lines to configure the computer:

ul.li: Select and confirm the lineVP003or "Steering wheel angle sensor" and follow the procedure described on the tool to calibrate the steering wheel angle sensor,
Select and confirm the lineVP007or "Tachometric index" then follow the procedure described on the tool to configure the tachometric index,
Select and confirm the lineVP004or "Vehicle parameter" then follow the procedure described on the tool to configure the vehicle type.

procstep.para: Clear any faults that have been stored in the computer.
Carry out a road test to confirm the repair.
